preface.title: Foreword: ${project.version}
preface.para: The book you are reading was originally a part of Maven: The Definitive Guide. As Sonatype expanded our coverage of this chapter for the Nexus Professional release we decided to separate the Repository Management chapter into a stand-alone title. This book covers both Nexus Open Source and Nexus Professional, a product which brings full control and visibility to organizations which depend on Maven repositories to manage releases and distribute software. The major push of this specific revision is in the Procurement Suite, Staging Suite, and the LDAP integration. This version updates the LDAP chapter.

You are encouraged to check http://books.sonatype.com/nexus-book weekly for any updates to the content. If you would like to receive updates whenever there is a change to this user's manual, please send a quick note to support@sonatype.com, and we will gladly add your email to the update notification list.

We welcome your feedback, please do not hesitate to contact the Sonatype team with any questions or ideas you may have about the product. We're focused on making the adoption of Nexus Professional painless, and we are here to do anything we can to help speed up the learning curve associated with some of the more advanced and powerful features of Nexus Professional.
